changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS train ( id INT PRIMARY KEY AUTO_INCREMENT, number VARCHAR(500), places_number INT )

changeSet.author: Victoria
Victoria
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS station ( id INT PRIMARY KEY AUTO_INCREMENT, name VARCHAR(500) )

changeSet.author: Victoria
Victoria
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS passenger ( id INT PRIMARY KEY AUTO_INCREMENT, name VARCHAR(100), surname VARCHAR(100), birth_date DATE )

changeSet.author: Victoria
Victoria
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS schedule ( id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, station_id INTEGER NOT NULL, train_id INTEGER NOT NULL, arrivalTime DATETIME, departureTime DATETIME, FOREIGN KEY (station_id) REFERENCES station(id), FOREIGN KEY (train_id) REFERENCES train(id) )

changeSet.author: Victoria
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS scheduledb ( id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, train_name VARCHAR(500), station_name VARCHAR(500), arrivalTime DATETIME, departureTime DATETIME, places_left INTEGER )

changeSet.author: Victoria
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS ticket ( id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, train_id INTEGER NOT NULL, passenger_id INTEGER NOT NULL, start_station_id INTEGER NOT NULL, end_station_id INTEGER NOT NULL, departure_time DATETIME, arrival_time DATETIME, FOREIGN KEY (train_id) REFERENCES train(id), FOREIGN KEY (passenger_id) REFERENCES passenger(id), FOREIGN KEY (start_station_id) REFERENCES station(id), FOREIGN KEY (end_station_id) REFERENCES station(id) )

changeSet.author: Victoria
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS ticketdb ( id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, train_id INTEGER NOT NULL, start_station_id INTEGER NOT NULL, end_station_id INTEGER NOT NULL, places_number INTEGER NOT NULL, departureTime DATETIME, arrivalTime DATETIME )
